definitions.title: n.f
definitions.body: coming round, circuit;—cstr. [[תְּקוּפַת הַשָּׁנָה]] Ex 34:22 (JE), adv., at the circuit (completion) of the year, so [[הַשָּׁנׇה]] ´[[לִת]]: 2Ch 24:33; = pl. cstr. [[לִתְקֻפוֹת הַיׇּמִים]] 1Sa 1:20; sg. sf. of finished circuit of sun Ps 19:7 (opp. [[מוֹחָאוֹ]]; cf. of moon, [[בתקופתו]] Sir 43:7).
